title: Schlage ND85P6D RHO 626 (Rhodes) Faculty Restroom Lever Lock - Retail over $600
item_description:
Schlage ND85P6D RHO 626 (Rhodes) Faculty Restroom Lever Lock - Retail over $600

  • Item is Brand New and retail value over $600
  • All hardware is included!
  • Satin Chrome Finish
  • Schlage ND85PD Grade 1 Faculty Restroom Lock, Rhodes Lever, Standard Cylinder, Satin Chrome Finish
    The ND Series is ANSI/BHMA Grade 1 certified and performs beyond the Grade 1 standards. The Schlage ND is regularly used in healthcare, education, government, office, retail, and other commercial applications.
  • ND85 â€“ Outside lever is fixed. Entrance by key only. Visual occupancy indicator, allowing only emergency key to operate. Turn inside lever or close door to unlock. Rotation of inside spinner button enables lock-out feature. Inside lever always free for immediate egress. Not available with interchangeable core cylinders.
  • Significantly exceeds ANSI/BHMA Grade 1 requirements
  • Withstands 3,100 in-lb. of abusive lever torque, as well as 1,600 lbs. of offset lever pull for protection against pry bar attacks
  • Not only strong from attacks, but it also shows nearly zero droop or wobble after 16 million cycles
  • The strongest cylindrical lock Schlage has ever built
